lead_paragraph: Living out of a Ford Explorer after losing his home, an unemployed chemist changes his own trajectory while stirring the altruistic impulses of some who were wary of him.

headline.print_headline: Living in S.U.V., Transformed From a Menace to a Neighbor
headline.main: Making the Journey From Menace to Neighbor, All on One Brooklyn Block

snippet: Living out of a Ford Explorer after losing his home, an unemployed chemist changes his own trajectory while stirring the altruistic impulses of some who were wary of him.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column relates odyssey of unemployed chemist Gene, who sleeps in his Ford Explorer in Park Slope, Brooklyn, and is now viewed as neighbor rather than menace by residents; Gene, who received money and aid from those living on the block, is now on disability insurance and plans to move to Wisconsin.
